entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
